attributes.additional_details: Skating and BMXing has become rapidly more popular within the last year and is begining to become a major part of many young peoples lives. There are no Skateparks within Lincoln, the nearest being Welton and proposed Plans to build one in Sudbrooke. Straight away, this problem means that many people have to nag their parents, or pay for there transport there and this is the last thing you want to worry about when you wake up on a sunny day and want to get outside and skate. I feel that a skatepart built on the west common would provide a perfect place for people to save money, have fun and most importantly... skate
